m_szDocTitle: Bill Gates & Seveneves Author Cruise & Chat In Tesla Model X | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Bill Gates & Seveneves Author Cruise & Chat In Tesla Model X May 19th, 2016 by James Ayre   One of the wealthiest people in the world, Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates, recently conducted an interview with the author of the popular sci-fi novel “Seveneves”… inside a “Deep Blue” Tesla Model X in Seattle. The interview with Neal Stephenson — which was conducted for Bill Gates’ GatesNotes  blog — probably serves as a good example of just how deeply Tesla has managed to work itself into the public consciousness over just a few years.
